meanings.definition: A circular symbol depicting a snake or dragon eating its own tail, representing infinity or cyclicality.
meanings.sent1: The ouroboros is a symbol of never-ending cycles.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful ouroboros pendant at the jewelry store.
meanings.sent3: The ouroboros at the center of the painting seemed to wink at me.
meanings.sent4: The concept of life as an ouroboros is both fascinating and profound.
meanings.sent5: The ouroboros in the ancient manuscript was intricately detailed.
